means: （举止）不得体的，不合时宜的，易遭非议的

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(U2) ... unseemliness 不合适 unseemly 不体面的 unseen translation 未经预备章节之翻译.
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... unscrupulousness 狂妄，肆无忌惮 unseemly 不适当的，不宜的 unsettle 使不安宁，搅乱.
张红岩TOEFL ... unruly adj. 难控制的，不守法的 unseemly adj. 不适宜的 unshaken adj. 坚决的，不动摇的.
2011经济学人单词 - 翻译硕士考研论坛 ... Chiang Kai-shek 蒋介石 unseemly adj. 不适宜的；不得体的 villa envy 别墅嫉妒症.

list.abs: company officials saying it would be unseemly a lavish party in troubled economic times ., 公司官员说在经济艰难时期举行奢华聚会是不合时宜的.
不当的延迟 undue delay不当的举止 unseemly manner不当损害 undue detriment
THEY didn ' t come to unseemly diplomatic blows . Perhaps they should have ., 他们没有遭受不适当的外交打击 , 也许他们应该.
丑恶现象unseemly scene  不和谐 disharmonious  对于类似上面的词汇,可以借助汉英词典提前准备。这种准备效果极好。  今天的结束语是:Success can be prepared(成功.

entry.def: If you say that some-one's behaviour is unseemly, you disapprove of it because it is not polite or not suitable for a particular situation or occasion.

example.ex: It would be unseemly for judges to receive pay increases when others are having to tighten their belts.
example.tran: 在其他人正不得不勒紧裤腰带的时候，给法官提高薪水是不合适的。
遭非议的酗酒、争吵和赌博

means.word_mean: 1. not in keeping with accepted standards of what is right or proper in polite society;

auth_sentence.content: Her mother died. Her father remarried with unseemly haste.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her mother died. Her father remarried with unseemly haste.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her mother died. Her father remarried with unseemly haste.

auth_sentence.content: The middle-aged man drunk is an unseemly spectacle.
auth_sentence.res_content: The middle-aged man drunk is an unseemly spectacle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The middle-aged man drunk is an unseemly spectacle.

auth_sentence.content: Still, it created an unseemly appearance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Still, it created an unseemly appearance.

means.word_mean: (举止)不得体的, 不合时宜的, 易遭非议的

sentences.en: Everyone was shocked by his unseemly conduct.
sentences.cn: 大家都被他不得体的举动震惊了。

sentences.en: Your levity is unseemly at this time.
sentences.cn: 在这种场合, 你的轻率举动是不得体的。
